profile:
Top Island Construction is a Campbell River B.C. based business. The owner, Alan Hein, is a local resident of Campbell River and has been involved in residential and commercial construction for over 25 years. Top Island Construction proudly serves Northern Vancouver Island. We strive to keep your project on time and on budget. Our knowledge of framing, decks, siding and finishing is what sets us apart from our competition.

We'd love to work with you on your next project!
specialities: Renovations, Decks, Railings, siding, framing, finishing,
name: Top Island Construction
